content.22: But Hazael king of Syria oppressed Israel all the days of Jehoahaz.
content.24: So Hazael king of Syria died; and Ben-hadad his son reigned in his stead.
content.25: And Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz took again out of the hand of Ben-hadad the son of Hazael the cities, which he had taken out of the hand of Jehoahaz his father by war. Three times did Joash beat him, and recovered the cities of Israel.
